name: Kartik Mehta
about: I am passionate about entrepreneurship and innovation, and I enjoy connecting with founders and learning about their vision and challenges. I am always looking for new and exciting ideas within Agritech, B2B/Manufacturing and Fintech that can create positive impact and value in the Indian ecosystem. If you have a pitch or a quick introduction, please reach out to me at kartik@waterbridge.vc.

recommendations: Sarah Cassell “Kartik is an extremely personable and intelligent young man. Kartik's role was crucial to the smooth running of the summer school's overall administration including: registration of all students, petty cash control, day-to-day office management, and answering all incoming calls and emails from parents and head office. Kartik diligently handled all of this (and more) and maintained a high level of professionalism throughout.”
